document_title: What is hair loss? 15 Common causes and signs
subsection_content:
When experiencing the following situations, patients should see a doctor:
Itching or irritation on the scalp.; Too much hair falls out every day.; Sudden loss of a large amount of hair.
subsection_title: rung toc.json. When to see a doctor?
